snippet: A year after their harrowing rescue from the San José mine near Copiapó, Chile, the 33 miners are a varied lot. Some have returned to mining, some face unemployment and continued psychological fallout. None have found fame and fortune.
lead_paragraph: A year after their harrowing rescue from the San José mine near Copiapó, Chile, the 33 miners are a varied lot. Some have returned to mining, some face unemployment and continued psychological fallout. None have found fame and fortune.

headline.main: The 33 Chilean Miners, Then and Now
headline.seo: The 33 Chilean Miners, a Year After Their Rescue
